Little hint! you may already know
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Techs, Bits, Stones, & Orbs: Little hint! you may already know
By tigerbubble on Sunday, January 20, 2002 - 12:44 pm:

I found that it is a great idea for when you know your monster is soon to die, that you go and battle in one of the free rank battles and get a tech stone so that when your monster dies and you raise a new monster, not only will you get a tech from the dead monster's heart, but you will also have a stone to learn another move. many of you probably have already thought of this, but for those of you who haven't, now you have a new idea!

By John Hawley on Sunday, January 20, 2002 - 12:54 pm:

Also, if the tech matches the stone, you can give the stone and then give the heart to easily gain levels on the tech.

By Firebane632 on Sunday, May 5, 2002 - 06:40 am:

It's ecpspecaillay nice if you use it on arank c/b that was hibernating. that way, you cud have the next generation thoroughly trained.

By Anonymous on Monday, May 20, 2002 - 03:07 pm:

can u give a monster heart to a already alive monster/

By John Hawley on Monday, May 20, 2002 - 03:08 pm:

That's the only kind you can give a heart crystal to.
